name: Orc Attack (itch)
description:
Controls -

Arrow Keys to Move

Z to Progress Text Boxes/Make Choices

X to Fire

-

Orc Attack is an action packed "Defense Shooter" In the vein of classic titles such as Space Invaders and Missile Command. Fend off an endless swarm of furious Orcs with your flying sword, and score as high as you can to win bragging rights!
